title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
It stained my skin
body: This serum disappointed me , I spent so much money on it and it strained my face. I used this product for three weeks and I got some dark spots on my cheeks and nose that I didn‚Äôt have before. I used it every other night and in the mornings I raised it well and put sunscreen everyday even the days that I didn‚Äôt use the serum the night before. I have other products of this brand that work well but this serum did the opposite to me. Now I don‚Äôt know how to clean these dark spots. I am afraid to use any other product and make it worse.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Pure Retinol Face Serum with Vitamin B3. Anti Aging Face Serum for Lines, Wrinkles & Premature Sun Damage to Resurface & Hydrate. Suitable for Sensitive Skin, 1.0 Fl. Oz
title:
1.0 out of 5 stars
Not worth the money
body: I saw no difference in the appearance of my face after a month. I realize I can't expect miracles at age 74, but I'm blessed with Swedish genes so don't have as many wrinkles as you might be imagining. I'm adding to my comment a couole months later: the description says this is unscented. It is not in any way fragrance free. As I was trying to use up my purchase I got more and more sensitive to the smell. Now I drcided it is giving me such headaches, I'm throwing out the 2/3  remaining in the bottle. Pretty expensive purchase!
